1.「くそっ。もう 動けねぇ。| へなちょこ海賊団の 新入り風情が| なんだって こ: Damn. I can't move anymore. How can such a|weak pirate newcomer be so strong!

2.「ハルバルド海賊団の首領 ハルバルド。| ヴェリナード女王 ディオーレ様の御下命: Halbard, leader of the Halbard Pirates. By|order of Queen Diore of Verinard, I arrest you|and your pirate band.

3.「大手柄じゃないか アンタ。| アタイたちも 少しは 役に立ったかい？: You're a big shot, aren't you? Did me help you|at least a little bit?

4.「しかし コイツと組むなんて| <cs_pchero>も 思い切ったことをしたも: But <cs_pchero> did a bold thing to team up|with this guy. Well, thanks to you, I'm saved.

5.「組んだ覚えはない。利用しただけだ。: I don't remember teaming up with him. I just|used him.

6.「そうかい。それでも いいよ。| ハルバルド海賊団は これでオシマイだし| お宝: Oh, I see. I'm fine with that. The Halbard|Pirates are done, and we've got the treasure|map, so there's nothing to complain about.

7.「ならば 宝探し程度で 満足しておけ。| 今回は お前たちの海賊団の名が 命令書: Then be content with a treasure hunt. It's|just that your pirates' names weren't|mentioned in the orders this time.

8.「だが 海賊は 海賊だ。| オレは 絶対に 許さない……。: But pirates are pirates. I'll never forgive...

9.「いちいち 気に障ることを言うヤツだね。| 魔法戦士ってのは もっと オシャレで: You're the kind of guy who says things that|bother me every time. I thought armamentalists|were supposed to be more stylish and smart...

10.「さあ 船に戻ろうか <cs_pchero>。| 悪いけど 後で アンタも| 船: Let's get back to the ship <cs_pchero>. I'm|sorry, but maybe later you can face khao to|the captain's room for me, too?

11.「秘宝の地図を 手に入れたとはいえ| マドロックのヤツ 怒ってるだろうからね。|: Madlock's probably pissed off that we received|the treasure map. You'll just have to make it|up to him.

12.「なんだ この地図は……？| こんなもんが 本当に お宝の地図なのかよ！: What is this map...? Is this really a treasure|map?

13.「謎かけでも 仕掛けられてるんじゃないのかい？| もっと よく見てみなよ。: Is there some kind of riddle being played on|you? Look more closely.

14.「だってよぉ。地形みてえなのすら ないんだぜ。| なあ。ニセモンを つかまされた: Because, you know. There's not even a|topography. Hey. Maybe they gave us a fake.

15.「そんなはずは ないよ。| あれは 確かな情報だったんだ。: That's not possible. It was solid information.

16.「アタイにも 貸してみな……っと！: Let me know if I can borrow it!

17.「てめぇ！ どういうつもりだっ！？: You son of a bitch!　What the hell are you|doing?

18.「この地図は アタイが いただいていく。| アンタみたいな ウドの大木に| お宝: I'm taking this map. There's no way a big udo|tree like you can find the treasure!

19.「最初から 地図を奪うつもりだったってか。| だが ここから 無事に帰れるなんて: You were planning to take the map from the|beginning. But you don't think you'll make it|back in one piece from here, do you...?

21.「てめぇは……。| あのときの 魔法戦士か！？: Are you... the armamentalist from back then?

22.「アタイを 放っとくわけないと思ったよ。| 魔法戦士の兄チャンを 連れてくるとは: I knew they wouldn't leave me alone. I didn't|expect him to bring his armamentalist brother.

23.「悪いね。アイツの相手は まかせるよ。| アタイは この地図を 守らないとさ。: I'm sorry. I'll leave him to you. Me, I have|to protect this map.

24.「なんだぁ 小娘？ 新入りごときに| ワシの相手が務まるって 言いてえのか？|: What is it, little girl?　You think you can|handle me? Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah...

26.「うるせぇ！| てめぇの相手は 後だ！！: Shut up! I'll deal with you later!

28.「海賊の礼儀ってのを てめぇの身体に| たたき込んでやる。覚悟しろよっ！！: I'm going to teach you some pirate etiquette.|Prepare yourself!
